bind

public static <T> T bind(java.lang.Class<T> definition,
                         org.w3c.dom.Document document)
Creates a new instance of the supplied interface and binds it to a Document. Invoking the methods of the created instance will build the document tree

Type Parameters:
T -
Parameters:
definition - A schema interface
document - An empty Document
Returns:
A new instance of schema, bound to the document
